Grim Warning.name: Grim Warning
Grim Warning.flavor: A vicious strike from your weapon reminds the enemy why attacking you is such a bad idea.
Grim Warning.trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack
Grim Warning.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.

Scattering Strike.name: Scattering Strike
Scattering Strike.flavor: After delivering a crippling strike to your foe, you reverse the weapon to clear yourself some space.
Scattering Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon
Scattering Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
Scattering Strike.effect: You push each adjacent creature other than the target 2 squares.

Blocking Maneuver.name: Blocking Maneuver
Blocking Maneuver.flavor: Adjusting your grip, you move your weapon to intercept the attack.
Blocking Maneuver.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Blocking Maneuver.trigger: An enemy you have marked makes an attack against you
Blocking Maneuver.effect: You end the mark to gain a +4 bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.
Blocking Maneuver.special: You cannot mark this enemy until the end of your next turn.
